name: Pearl Farm Beach Resort
description: Pearl Farm Beach Resort was once home to a pearl farm, where precious pearls were nurtured and cultivated as the ocean's most beautiful gems. Today, it is Samal Island's jewel; an exceptional destination just off the coast of the bustling Davao City. Here, luxurious comfort, breathtaking Filipino design, a protected natural environment, and the rich culture of the southern Philippines meet. Together, they create a relaxing, private retreat unlike any other in the Philippine archipelago

name: Seagull White Sand Beach Resort
location: Punta Dumalag Road, Talomo, Davao City, Davao del Sur
description: Seagull White Sand Beach Resort is among the many mid-end beach resorts that line-up the white sand stretch along a grayish to black sand shoreline of Punta Dumalag, Matina Aplaya, Davao City. Seagull was once voted one of the Top-5 beaches in Davao City.

name: Paradise Island Park and Beach Resort
description: Paradise Island Park And Beach Resort Davao comprises 70 rooms. There is a 24-hour security and shopping service at the boutique style resort too.

name: Kembali Coast
description: Kembali is the luxury vacation you have always wanted to have with your loved ones. This exclusive beach community is where you can enjoy nature at its best. It is a place of endless adventure. Your own private paradise.

name: Mergrande Ocean Resort
location: Bago Aplaya, Talomo District, Davao City
description: Mergrande Ocean Resort is a beachfront property located in Davao. It features an outdoor pool, tennis court and mini-golfcourse. Select cottages have a balcony with sea views. Mergrande Ocean Resort is a 20-minute drive from Supermall Davao.

name: Chema's By The Sea
description: Skirts along the country's most enormous island garden, Chema's By The Sea brings a nature retreat with the best of land and water. A nature beach resort in Samal Island, Davao City, it features towering landscapes of beautiful greeneries and a quaint white sand beach offering a tranquil view of the Davao metropolis.

name: Costa Marina
description: Costa Marina Beach Resort is one of the most accessible and budget-friendly resorts located at Caliclic, Babak District in Samal Island. Aside from its accessibility, the resort is almost never crowded and it's privacy makes it special.

name: Hof Gorei
description: Hof Gorei Beach Resort is a beachfront hideaway along the tranquil west coast of fabled Island Garden City of Samal in the Philippines - known for its beautiful white sand beaches, blue seas, sunny skies, and hospitable people.

name: Club Samal Resort
descirption: The Club Samal Resort is an ideal spot for travelers wanting to discover the city. The Club Samal Resort offers a pleasant stay in Samal Island for those traveling for business or leisure.

name: Villa Amparo Gardern Beach Resort
description: Villa Amparo Garden Resort was once a private get-away of the owners, their family and friends. It was only opened to the public on April 16, 2010. When the road going to resort was fully concreted last January 30, 2015, more guests came as it became easily accessible.

name: Leticia By The Sea
description: Leticia by The Sea is Dava's 'off the beaten track' destination hidden in the island of Talicud. Experience a natural and rustic setting that is uniquely beautiful with facilities and service that ensure exclusivity and privacy. Take life at your own pace.

name: Secdea Beach Resort
description: Secdea Beach Resort is a privately owned resort located in San Isidro, Babac, Samal Island, Davao. The resort is famous for its top notch facilities and un-parallel hospitality service. It sits on 56 hectares which offers beautiful beach setting, fishing lagoon, multi-sports pavilion, function halls, a small chapel, a clubhouse, a mangrove park and luxurious cottages with eloquently designed furniture.

name: Bali-Bali Beach Resort
description: Bali Bali Beach resort is the resort of your dreams. Its name, Bali Bali, means beautiful in Pangasinan dialect and indeed, it is. Every single spot of this resort is gorgeous. You know that you're in Samal Island but you'd think you're in Bali.

name: Holiday Oceanview Samal Resort
description: HOLIDAY OCEANVIEW is developed by Holiday Properties, the real estate arm of the Holiday Business Group, ventures a dream project that redefines luxury living. This development boasts a mixed-use community showcases a residential setting, a condominium, a spa, and a first in Davao - a marina.

name: Cavanico IL Mare
description: Formerly known as Pacific Heights Resort, the new Cavanico Il Ma Re Beach Resort is located in Baranggay Camudmud. It's just a few minutes away from the Babak Port where you can find the splendid white sand coastline.
